page.title: 04HEALTH
page.content:
All figures relate to 280 households surveyed in the area.
{ITEM |}PERCENTAGE {_____________________________________ {LONG_TERM ILLNESS |}15.8 {SMOKERS |}54.3 {REGULAR EXERCISERS |}66.7 {DIABETICS |}28.3 {ALLERGY SUFFERERS |}32.0 {REGULAR DENTAL CHECKS |}68.0 {DIET CONSCIOUS |}51.0 {SPECTACLE WEARERS |}46.0 {REGULAR EYE CHECKS |}29.0 {IN RECEIPT OF PRIVATE | {MEDICAL TREATMENT |}29.0 {IN RECEIPT OF STATE | } {BENEFIT |}31.0 {______________________________________ Of those who receive state benefit, 59% thought it inadequate. 69% thought local health provision inadequate.
